title: Spicy beef and vegetable stir fry
ingredients: ['For the sauce', '1 (2cm) piece fresh ginger, peeled', '1 large garlic clove, peeled', '1 fresh red chilli', '1 teaspoon hot chilli sauce', '1 1/2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 1/2 limes, juiced', '1 1/2 tablespoons fish sauce', 'For the stir fry', '375g rice noodles', '1 tablespoon sesame oil, for frying', '350g beef pieces for stir frying', '1 red pepper, thinly sliced', '200g pak choi, quartered', '6 spring onions, chopped', 'fresh coriander', 'chopped peanuts (optional)']
